import { useState } from 'react' import styles from '../../styles/User.module.css' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { createUser } from '../../features/user/userSlice' const UserSignupForm = ({ closeForm }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [values, setValues] = useState({ name: '', email: '', avatar: '', password: '', }) const handleChange = ({ target: { value, name } }) => { setValues({ ...value, [name]: value }) } const handleSubmite = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const isNotEmpty = Object.values(values).some(val => !val) if(isNotEmpty) return; dispatch(createUser(values)) closeForm() } return (
Sign Up
I already have an account
) } export default UserSignupForm
